ingredients: 5 quarts very ripe plums, pitted, or as needed, 4 cloves garlic, pressed, 1  onion, finely chopped, 6 cups white sugar,   +   1/2 cup apple cider vinegar, 2 tablespoons Southwest chipotle seasoning, 1 tablespoon roasted garlic seasoning, 1  jalapeno pepper, finely chopped (remove seeds for milder flavor if desired), 7 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon liquid smoke flavoring, 8  half-pint canning jars with lids and rings
nutrition: Total Fat 0g 0%, Sodium 179mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 13g 5%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 3mg 14%, Calcium 2mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 45mg 1%
